login.loginDesc: With Verein.Cloud® we open up added value and sources of income for associations that go beyond the premium income. A donation platform creates automated access to the financing of plans and projects. With the profiled access to club members, clubs can integrate their sponsors more sustainably. Members and associations benefit from loyalty, voucher or cash back functions and other added value and services.
